metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4419 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: The guestfish command in libguestfs 1.20.12, 1.22.7, and earlier, when using the --remote or --listen option, does not properly check the ownership of /tmp/.guestfish-$UID/ when creating a temporary socket file in this directory, which allows local users to write to the socket and execute arbitrary commands by creating /tmp/.guestfish-$UID/ in advance.

criterions.comment: libguestfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
